org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy.scanner
Class AeDirectoryScanner

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy.scanner.AeDirectoryScanner
public class AeDirectoryScanner
extends java.lang.Object

Watches over a given directory and listens for changes.

Constructor Detail

AeDirectoryScanner

public AeDirectoryScanner(java.lang.String aScanDir,
                          long aScanInterval,
                          java.io.FilenameFilter aFilter,
                          java.util.Comparator aComparator)
Constructor.

Parameters:
aScanDir - The directory to watch over.
aScanInterval - The scan interval. Set to -1 for single scan only.
aFilter - A FilenameFilter to select a subset of files. Pass in null to include all files.
Method Detail

prime

public java.io.File[] prime()
Prime the watch list with any matching files and return an array of File objects that have been registered with the scanner.

start

public void start()
Starts the scanning process.

scanImpl

protected void scanImpl()
The scan impl code. NOTE: If a file has been modified/replaced, two separate scan events will be fired - a removal event AND an addition event.
